Package de.ralleytn.simple.input

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DeviceListener
    Contains the methods that all device listener need.
    GamepadListener
    Listens to gamepad events.
    KeyboardListener
    Listens to keyboard events.
    MouseListener
    Listens to mouse events.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultGamepad
    Represents a gamepad that uses the DirectInput API.
    Device
    Represents an input device.
    DeviceEvent
    Represents an abstract input event.
    DeviceManager
    Manages the input devices.
    Gamepad
    Represents a gamepad.
    GamepadAdapter
    Implements the GamepadListener interface.
    GamepadEvent
    Represents an event that was fired by a gamepad.
    Keyboard
    Represents a keyboard.
    KeyboardAdapter
    Implements the KeyboardListener interface.
    KeyboardEvent
    Represents an event that was triggered by a keyboard.
    Mouse
    Represents a mouse.
    MouseAdapter
    Implements the MouseListener interface.
    MouseControl
    Responsible for controlling the mouse with a gamepad.
    MouseEvent
    Represents an event that can be fired by mice.
    XInputGamepad
    Represents a gamepad that uses the XInput API.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Direction
    Represents a direction.
